title: Devilman: Crybaby - Digest Eizou
content:
I'll be quick on this, it's just a montage from clips of the parent show that goes on summarizing everything that happened on the show without any major spoilers and with as PG-13 as possible.
Not going to lie, I just finished watching the series not even an hour ago, and it made me want to re-watch it for the rest of the day.
The emotion is there, the action is teased, it's a great clip to show to friends you want to get int othe series, at least it has that to it. But still, why a MAL entry for this? Netflix must be paying alot of cash.
